P

Parser - Class in trains
This class handles XML related functions for loading a Perti Network XML is obtained and created using the popular XStream serializer

PetriThread - Class in trains
Custom runnable object to simulate the behavior of a Petri Network activity.

Customised thread constructor that pre-loads all transitions out-linked to the place parameter using the preMatrix.
